docs.snippet: The New Orleans Saints have confirmed a multiyear contract with Jimmy Graham, ending a holdout by the star tight end....

docs.snippet: Chris Kluwe, who said he was let go because he accused a coach of harassment and homophobic statements, is threatening to sue the team for not giving him the results of an investigation into his release....
docs.lead_paragraph: Chris Kluwe, who said he was let go because he accused a coach of harassment and homophobic statements, is threatening to sue the team for not giving him the results of an investigation into his release.
docs.abstract: Former Minnesota Vikings punter Chris Kluwe threatens to sue team for failing to share with him findings of investigation into allegations that he was released because he accused one of his coaches of harassment and homophobic statements; Kluwe, who is not gay but had spoken out in favor of same-sex marriage, is accusing team of violating state law prohibiting discrimination based on sexual orientation.

headline.print_headline: Ex-Punter Pressuring Vikings for Results of Inquiry

docs.snippet: Soccer’s governing body has taken a misguided approach to concussions in large part because of the sport’s substitution rules, which allow for only three replacements per game....
docs.lead_paragraph: Soccer’s governing body has taken a misguided approach to concussions in large part because of the sport’s substitution rules, which allow for only three replacements per game.
docs.abstract: Juliet Macur Sports of the Times column holds that image of Christoph Kramer suffering effects of head injury that was incurred during World Cup final spotlights FIFA's misguided approach to concussions and how desperately it needs to amend its substitution rules.

headline.seo: World Cup 2014: Christoph Kramer’s Head Injury Brings FIFA’s Problem to the Forefront

docs.snippet: A meeting over coffee between Israel Folau and Australia's National Rugby League (NRL) football boss has caused a minor media storm Down Under amid speculation the dual international may quit rugby to return to the 13-man code....
